item.title: About me
item.author: sakh1979@gmail.com (Sagun Khatri)
item.description: Few things about me: I specialize in portrait photography, I like working on: high school senior shoot engagement shoot head shots I am a strobist photographer, meaning I use small pocket strobes to take a well lit, balanced, and appealing pictures I like working on new and interesting ideas If you like my work, and would like to work with me, please feel free to contact me.
